words.definition: Making a musical ringing sound, typically that of a bell or clock
words.example: The bell was chiming above her head as she entered the coffee shop.

words.definition: A period of intense activity or high demand; a situation requiring urgency
words.example: The morning rush is in full swing at the coffee shop.

words.definition: A person who prepares and serves coffee drinks, especially espresso-based beverages
words.example: Emma, the barista, has memorized Sarah's order perfectly.

words.definition: An Italian coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk foam
words.example: She ordered a large cappuccino with an extra shot of espresso.

words.definition: A machine that brews coffee by forcing pressurized hot water through finely ground coffee
words.example: Emma works the espresso machine with expert skill every morning.

words.definition: To make oneself comfortable in a place; to get established in a routine or location
words.example: She settles in for another productive morning at her favorite table.
